Member Function Documentation

virtual void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.SynapseDecorator.Connect ( ISynapse  synapse  )  [virtual]

Parameters:
synapse The synapse to be connected.

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

abstract void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.SynapseDecorator.Connect (  )  [pure virtual]

Connects the synapse.

A synapse is said to be connected if: 1. it is aware of its source neuron (and vice versa), and 2. it is aware of its target neuron (and vice versa).

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

Implemented in NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationSynapse.

virtual void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.SynapseDecorator.Disconnect ( ISynapse  synapse  )  [virtual]

Parameters:
synapse The synapse to be disconnected.

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

abstract void NeuralNetwork.Synapses.SynapseDecorator.Disconnect (  )  [pure virtual]

Disconnects the synapse.

A synapse is said to be disconnected if: 1. its source neuron is not aware of it (and vice versa) and 2. its target neuron is not aware of it (and vice versa).

Implements NeuralNetwork.Synapses.ISynapse.

Implemented in NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationSynapse.
